ygData.subject: Re: Geez!
ygData.msgSnippet: Its there life, and playing time, if they want to search for a book let them. Personally it doesn t really matter to me whether the formulas are found or not.
ygData.messageBody:
Its there life, and playing time, if they want to search for a book let
them. Personally it doesn't really matter to me whether the formulas are
found or not. All im saying is if they want to go on a crusade to find "X"
then it shouldn't bother you. :)
Wes Lobdell

-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua Bednarz <thewhitemage@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, October 16, 1999 3:41 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Geez!


>From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
>What will it take to get it through to you guys? There is NO damn third
>book, ANY formulas for items that have been figured out how to be made, if
>any at all were figured out by trial and error. There is absolutely NO
BOOK!
>NONE not -ANYWHERE- in the game! When there IS something will be said about
>it in the patch. Until then , just work on raising your tinkering skill,
>thats all I can say, doing anything else about tinkering, like trying to
>find a non-existant book, or trying to figure out a formula with next to
>nothing odds is just a TOTAL 100% waste of time!
>
>>
